name: Noel Gleeson
introduction:
my name is Noel Gleeson——and I'm a self-described "lover." I use a variety of electronics for my daily life; this includes my cell phone, Kindle, PlayStation, Android and my computer. I love cats and dogs.
I have a boyfriend and a dog named Kaylee.
I love to travel, dogs, movies, and to have fun with. I like to laugh, play games, take care of each other as friends, and take pride in ourselves for who we are.
